content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":23601,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a881c07f-7780-416d-96c5-16367d4f3f55/Header 1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a881c07f-7780-416d-96c5-16367d4f3f55/Header 1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Header 1.png\",\"name\":\"Header 1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a881c07f-7780-416d-96c5-16367d4f3f55\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":178.29967756600215},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":44976,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bf490aa-96ba-4fe2-ac3f-d52c243c6a8c/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bf490aa-96ba-4fe2-ac3f-d52c243c6a8c/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6bf490aa-96ba-4fe2-ac3f-d52c243c6a8c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":138,\"height\":138},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hi colleague! Glad to see you have joined our quality engineering professionals’ team.\\nMy name is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Aliaksandr_Baranouski?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Alex Baranouski\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". I am the head of the Quality Engineering in GDO-VS region - it’s a huge international network of testers who works together online and across borders and uniting professionals from 11 locations – Belarus, Armenia, Lithuania, Latvia, Georgia, Poland, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Montenegro and Turkey.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":164609,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e1350bb-8eff-49da-a9f7-7eee7989cd5c/Map NewNew March.jpeg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e1350bb-8eff-49da-a9f7-7eee7989cd5c/Map NewNew March.jpeg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Map NewNew March.jpeg\",\"name\":\"Map NewNew March.jpeg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5e1350bb-8eff-49da-a9f7-7eee7989cd5c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":686,\"height\":402},\"extension\":\"jpeg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Back in 2005 I was in your place, having joined EPAM as a software testing engineer. Since then, I changed a number of assignments, led teams, coordinated projects, gave lectures, trained Junior specialists in the laboratory, and participated in various initiatives of the company. Based on my own experience, I have no doubt that you will never get bored here. In Quality Engineering Network you will always have a wide choice of growth directions. You can try game and security testing, switch from manual testing to automation testing. Follow the path of management or engineering career. You will also learn more about on-demand and trendy Testing as a Service model and get to know how to join crowd testing opportunities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" What is Quality Engineering Network? What this video and explore:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=jaNPLdJ6\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are no physical boundaries and no limits on opportunities - everything depends on your interests and personal goals. You will meet like-minded people from different countries and testing communities. You will be inspired and will inspire others. Just choose your way to develop career - and the journey will begin. Watch the video where our locations heads share Quality Engineering Network benefits for you:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=mYQDLEap\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome aboard and good luck! \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
